A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It is visually impressive\, for sure. It also features strong performances (something that does not pass for given in the Star Wars universe). And I feel that I need to say that I am a) not a robot\, b) not a Donald Trump supporter\, and c) a longtime Star Wars fan. I really wanted to love this movie\, and perhaps that is part of the problem. That said\, it lacks narrative cohesion\, and I have to agree with folks who have already said that it feels like a reboot (from the Force Awakens\, no less) that does not really move the larger story forward. Saying that it is worse than Attack of the Clones is a bit harsh\, but its visual polish does\, for me at least\, did not make up for the rather egregious narrative gaps. And Luke milks a space cow.
